– initApiSigner:andhexKey:

Create an API signer instance according to HSDP specification

- (id)initApiSigner:(NSString *)sharedKey andhexKey:(NSString *)hexKey

Api signing shared key
hexSecretKey

– createSignature:dhpUrl:queryString:headers:requestBody:

Create an API signer instance according to HSDP specification

- (NSString *)createSignature:(NSString *)requestMethod dhpUrl:(NSString *)url queryString:(NSString *)requestUrlQuery headers:(NSDictionary *)allHttpHeaderFields requestBody:(NSData *)httpBody

Parameters

requestMethod

Type of method(POST, GET)
queryString

Request URL query. applicationName=uGrow
dhpUrl

Request URL
headers

Request http header fields. Current date is passed as http header value.
requestBody

Request body
